thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-EP Energy Q4 Loss Per Share $0.29

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-EP Energy Q4 Loss Per Share $0.29
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Ep Energy Corp:
* EP ENERGY ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.29 * Q4 ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 * ‍FOR YEAR ENDED DEC 31, 2017, AVERAGE DAILY PRODUCTION WAS 82.3 MBOE/D​
* ‍Q4 2017 AVERAGE DAILY PRODUCTION WAS 80.6 MBOE/D, INCLUDING 43.6 MBBLS/D OF OIL​
* ‍EP ENERGY IS REAFFIRMING ITS PREVIOUSLY PROVIDED OPERATIONAL AND FINANCIAL GUIDANCE FOR FULL YEAR 2018​
* SEES 77 MBOE/D TO 79 MBOE/D OF ‍TOTAL PRODUCTION IN Q1​ * SEES 43 MBBLS/D TO 44 MBBLS/D ‍OIL PRODUCTION IN Q1​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
